name: Testimonial Master
author: Frank Corso

sections.description:
Showing testimonials on your website helps you to attract and keep new clients/customers! Use this plugin to enter and display testimonials using included widget or shortcodes.

Features

  • Allows for unlimited testimonials
  • Shortcode to show all testimonials
  • Shortcode to show a random testimonial
  • Included widget shows a random testimonial
  • Shortcode to allow users to enter a testimonial

Make Suggestions Or Contribute

Testimonial Master is on GitHub! I have plenty of items on my to-do list for this plugin. I would love to hear your feedback so feel free to open issues or comment on any existing ones. Feel free to fork and open pull requests!
sections.installation:
• Navigate to Add New Plugin page within your WordPress
  • Search for Testimonial Master
  • Click Install Now link on the plugin and follow the prompts
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Or

  • Upload plugin dir to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
I have an idea, how do I contact you?

Feel free to create an issue on GitHub or use the support widget on the help page in the plugin
sections.changelog:
= 0.2.1 (April 22, 2015)
*Updated the Tested up to area to reflect compatibility with WordPress 4.2

0.2.0 (March 1, 2015)

  • New Shortcode For Allowing Users To Enter Testimonial
  • Admin Page Redesign
  • New Update Page
  • Now Translation Ready
  • In Code: Now Uses Custom Post Types
  • In Code: Rewrote Entire Plugin
  • In Code: Added Various Hooks And Filters For Extending Plugin

0.1.8 (June 21, 2014)

  • Change Defualt Order To Show Newest First
  • Minor Bug Fixes

0.1.6 (June 7, 2014)

  • Fixed Edit Button Not Working Bug
  • Fixed URL Not Showing Bug

  • Minor Design Changes

  • Minor Bug Fixes
